column5: Anyone been up there yet?  Know if it's open...?
i was there last year a week after pike opener and it stunk i think i fished it wrong tho
I haven't been there yet myself, but it should be open around the edges with all this warm weather we've been having. Let us know if you make it out for a look.
Looks like Pike are closed March 31st to Second Saturday in May.  That sound about right?  I'd better dust off the daredevil and get up there soon...
I'm pretty sure the March open season applies only to Lake Ontario.  Best to check the MNR website.
